name: Allotments and their Hazardous Environments
description:
My entry to the GMC game jam.

Theme:  'Hazardous Environments'

Story: 

Fly Tippers are chucking their 'Hazardous' contents into this allotment plot which is contaminating all the flowers! Weeds are growing all over the place and these arn't just any normal weeds, their mutant weeds! and they are running a muck!.

Objective:

De-contaminate the plots and get the weeds under control, and restore the allotment back to its once beautiful environment.

Note: this game has no end and will just continue on, so to quit just press escape. :)

Credits:

Artwork = Chasersgaming

Music = Nintendo Style - Funny Music Loop 02 by PlayonLoop
